name: Personal, Inc.
tag_list: own, share, save, profit, digital-privacy, digital-security
description: Create and Manage the Digital You
overview:
Everything you do online and on your mobile phone is tracked and compiled by companies trying to figure “you” out. This Digital You includes what you like, read, and buy … even information about your kids, pets and friends. A multi-billion dollar marketplace has emerged to buy and sell this data and target you with advertising. Like it or not, all this information is fair game and it’s all captured and sold without your consent.

This information is largely incomplete and inaccurate, yet thousands of companies use it every day to determine the content and search results you see, the offers and services you receive…even the prices you pay.

With Personal, all that can change. Personal allows you to create and manage a Digital You that you control.

  • Save time by having a single place to privately store the information that you choose
  • Share the information privately with friends and family you trust, without worrying about it being shared with anyone else
  • Save time and money with content and offers that truly match your needs
